questions.quote: Go to any office building on 7th Avenue and tell me if there's anyone there wearing a thin tie like that. Go ahead!
Ah those are the pastries, Ray take care of that, I'm going to get Elaine the manuscript.
Well, I'm really sorry I gotta run now.  Well, take it easy, huh, George?
So, she's the loser of the group. Every group has someone that they all make fun of.. Like us with Elaine.
No. I like the ball! This is my One Chance to make a Great Entrance! My whole life! I have never made a great entrance!
Yeah! Get in there and give her a call. Pick up the phone and call her!
That would be good too. The idea is combine the this and the that. But this cannot be disturbed.
You know, I'm the one responsible for those crop circles in England.
Excuse me...I really... What's happened is that my friend forgot where he parked and if you're not in a big hurry, we'd really appreciate it if...
Yeah, that's Jerry, you don't have to worry about him. Why don't you go across the hall and get started on that mail.
